resourceText: This link is to the page for the Substance Abuse and Mental Health Services Administration's 24/7 helpline. You can call it any time if you are experiencing a crisis. It is free of charge and confidential. The number is 1-800-662-4357

Psychology Today has a nice 'find a therapist' search tool that can help you find a therapist or psychiatrist in your area (US only). They have various filters that can be applied to your search as well.
